```{r}
#| include = FALSE
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "man/figures/vignettes-"
)
```

```{r}
#| echo = FALSE
bib <- root$find_file(
  "vignettes",
  "bib.bib"
)
X <- RefManageR::ReadBib(bib)
key <- names(X)
annotation <- lapply(X = X, function(x) x$annotation)
keywords <- lapply(X = X, function(x) x$keywords)
x <- cbind(
  key = key,
  annotation = annotation,
  keywords = keywords
)
knitr::kable(x)
```
